reasons.description: You did not enclose the order form or an incomplete order form was enclosed.
You did not sign the order form, as required.
You did not provide your birthdate (required) or you included the current date.
You did not choose a Vantage carton style.
You did not enclose the appropriate number of outer pack wrappers (with UPC symbols) for the item(s) you requested.

instructions.resubmission: Resubmitted requests must be returned within 15 days from receipt of this letter to the P.O. Box indicated on the order form.
